name: 5 STATE CHALLENGE! New England Road Trip with the Norwegian 737-MAX8
description:
Here's what happened when I took the 5 state challenge - and flew to the USA to take a New England road trip and check off 5 states in one crazy day!

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE! 

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/inflightvideo

FLIGHTS FEATURED
Flybe Dash 8-Q400 East Midlands to Edinburgh
Norwegian Boeing 737-MAX8 Edinburgh to Hartford, CT
Norwegian Boeing 737-800 - Providence to Edinburgh
Flybe Dash 8-Q400 Edinburgh to East Midlands

For those of you getting a sense of deja vu - yes this is a re-edit of a vlog that I completely messed up last year, hopefully this is a better video :)


EXCLUSIVE AD FREE, FULL LENGTH FLIGHT VIDEOS: inflightvideo.tv
MUSIC: KZ - https://soundcloud.com/kzchillmode


FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/inflightvideo
